personas.persona: E-Commerce Operations Head / Supply Chain Manager
personas.goal: Transparency in order journey, fewer customer queries, automated logistics

Order confirmations: Notify customers that their order has been placed
Confirm the recent purchase with the customer
Delivery status calls: Update the customer about their delivery
Call to notify about shipment status
Inform users when their order is out for delivery
Refund/return alerts: Inform users that their return has been processed
Restock notifications: Notify when a product is back in stock
Send restock alert for previously sold-out items

personas.goal: Optimize campaign ROI, personalize outreach, re-engage abandoned carts

Flash sale calls: Inform customers about ongoing flash sales
Call users to notify about special discounts
Abandoned cart reminders: Remind users about items left in their cart
Loyalty campaign invites: Promote special offers for loyal customers
Promo expiration alerts: Notify about limited-time offers ending soon

personas.goal: Maximize registrations, timely attendee communication, efficient post-event data

Registration confirmations: Notify users their registration is successful
Session reminders: Notify users about session start times
Invitations to future events: Notify users about future workshops or webinars
Promote new events to past attendees

personas.goal: Improve satisfaction metrics, better complaint tracking, customer retention

Post-purchase feedback calls: Call customers for feedback after purchase
Ask about satisfaction with their recent order
Collect user opinions about the product/service
Complaint acknowledgments: Notify users that their complaint is being handled
Warranty reminders: Notify users about warranty coverage for purchased items
Send alerts for product warranty checks
Churn recovery: Encourage users to return and engage again

personas.goal: Automate buyer communication, improve feedback, maintain brand reliability

Order dispatch updates: Notify customers when order is shipped
Payment confirmations: Notify users their payment went through
Review requests: Ask customers to leave a review
Encourage users to rate their experience
Re-purchase prompts: Suggest reorder for frequently bought items
